results.title: [JML Official] Copper Fit Compression Elbow Sleeve | Reduce Swelling Relieve joint muscle stiffness | 2 Sizes
results.description:
COPPER FIT ELBOW COMPRESSION SLEEVE

This new compression sleeve from Copper Fit® helps increase circulation, reduce swelling, and ease pain & stiffness in muscles and joints. The copper-infused, high-performance fabric provides 4-way stretch for maximum flexibility and all-day comfort. The new contoured design provides a perfect fit, and the reinforced band keeps the sleeve from slipping. Nylon and spandex fabric blend infused with odor-reducing copper. Machine wash. Elbow Sleeve.

The original copper-infused elbow sleeve designed for maximum comfort and mobility
Comfortable compression helps provide rejuvenating relief and support for everyday at chest and pains, muscle stiffness and soreness
Supports improved circulation and oxygenation of working muscles which helps to reduce swelling for faster recovery

NOTE
All purchases are non-refundable once used.
